content: Patient survey from April 2023 indicates challenges accessing in-network specialists for chronic Lyme disease treatment within the Northwest region. Participant ID: NWL198755 reported delayed referrals and inconsistent insurance coverage for initial IV antibiotic protocols, leading to prolonged symptoms. Survey highlights geographic disparities in provider availability, with longest wait times at clinics in Spokane. Participant requested anonymity but provided contact ZIP 99201 for follow-up.
